attributes.action: request an apolgy from Rome for the slavery of Britons during the Roman Occupation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While some of the decedents of slaves who were liberated by Mr Wilberforce are still demanding a pointless apology, using their logic, we should be asking for an apology from Rome for the ill-treatment and the slavery of Britons during the Roman occupation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
